detail_desc: Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a small stand-up collar and zip down the front. Diagonal, zipped front pockets and long sleeves with wide elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy, and a gently rounded hem. The top is made partly from recycled polyester.
Vest tops in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps, picot trims at the top and a decorative satin bow at the front.
5-pocket trousers in washed, superstretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft, fine cotton blend with a motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with motifs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Long metal earrings with faceted plastic stones. Length approx. 7 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets and tapered legs.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-neck with a concealed button at the front, and short cap sleeves.
Vest top in airy jersey with a print motif and rounded hem.
Short, A-line dress in an airy cotton weave with a frill-trimmed Peter Pan collar and buttons down the front. Short, lined puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Short, straight-style dress in a viscose weave with wide, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit on top and ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless satin shirt dress with a collar, buttons down the front, drawstring at the waist that is pulled from the sides and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Shirt in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short, fitted jacket dress in a crêpe weave with peak lapels, a wrapover front with a concealed fastening and a detachable belt at the waist. Unlined.
Trousers in a fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist, decorative buttons at the top, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Wide top in a stretchy, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and a straight hem.

Cotton poplin shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Double-layered hat in a soft jacquard knit with a soft faux fur pompom on top and a small fabric appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps, raw, scalloped edges and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck.
Super push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in light sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch, supersoft twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud.
Hooded jacket with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Short-sleeved football shirt in printed, fast-drying functional fabric with press-studs at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in washed linen with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sports shorts in heavy jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets.
Cardigan in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. No buttons.

Parka in cotton twill with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood, shoulder tabs with a press-stud, and zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Flap chest and front pockets with concealed press-studs, a drawstring at the waist and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fitted dress in a soft knit with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Fancy dress costume with a zip down the front, hood with appliqués and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Leather court shoes with pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in washed stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Open poncho in an airy viscose weave with inset lace embroidery, a drawstring at the waist and slits in the sides.
Satin A-line dress with a halterneck, narrow racer back with decorative metal studs and zip in one side. Lined.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in a soft weave with elastication and a flounce at the top. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a foldover polo neck and long sleeves.

Maxi dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a racer back and rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Fitted, short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a collar, buttons down the front and overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder.
Short, fitted jersey dress with a wide V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Top in woven fabric with a lace trim at the top, V-neck front and back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jacket in soft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, covered buttons at the front and long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets. Reflective details and tapered legs with a zip at the hems.
Short-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a V-neck and wrapover top that has a practical inner top for easier nursing access. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Blouse in woven fabric with a deep V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with scalloped trims at the cuffs. Lined.
Leggings in denim-look stretch jersey with a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Jersey waistband for best fit.
Twill jacket made from Tencel™ lyocell with rounded lapels, a drawstring waist, long sleeves and a concealed press-stud at he front. Unlined.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Straight-cut dress in a soft weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Straight-cut shirt in cotton twill with a gently tapered waist. Turn-down collar, classic front with press-studs, and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Lace bralette with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Outdoor jacket in a rustle weave with a mesh-lined, drawstring hood. Zip down the front, elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Partly lined in mesh.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with overlocked edges, a concealed silicone trim at the top and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a concealed single-button fastening at the front. Jersey lining.
Vest top in soft, marled jersey with a chest pocket and raw, roll edges around the neckline and armholes.
Straight-cut dress in a soft weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with spaghetti straps. Concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Short, fitted dress in jersey with shoulder pads, a stand-up collar, gathers on one shoulder, a small opening down the back and concealed buttons at the back of the neck. Gathered seam at the waist for a draped effect and a wrapover skirt with ties at one side. Unlined.
Soft, patterned fleece top for a dog. Polo neck with a small opening at the top for a lead and openings underneath for the front legs.

Bomber jacket in a sturdy weave with a ribbed stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Side pockets, a zipped pocket on one sleeve, an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.

Body in soft microfibre with a lace section under the bust. Straight cut at the top and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, high-cut legs, a high cut at the back and lined gusset. Laser-cut edges around the legs for a smooth silhouette.
Short-sleeved top in a loose rib knit with a deep neckline and twisted detail at the back.
